resources.string: Thank you for upgrading to KeepSafe Premium

Hello,
My name is Zouhair, I am the founder of KeepSafe. I'm writing to thank you for upgrading to KeepSafe Premium. I hope you enjoy all the features you now have access to, including:
* Fake PIN * Secret Door * Break-In Alerts * Sync to multiple devices with up to 5000 items * Video backup * Password lock for albums * Custom Album covers * PIN timeout
Weâ€™re continuously working on improving KeepSafe and you will get all new features automatically.
In addition to all the new goodies in KeepSafe, we will prioritize you for support in case you need help at some point in time.
If you have any comments or questions, please reply to this email any time. I'm always happy to help.
Best Regards, Zouhair
